page.title: 13Notable Events
page.content: There has been a road widening scheme at the southern exit of Llandrindod. The old County Hall,a converted Victorian Hotel was found to be unsafe and the decision has been taken to rebuild it.The work on this project began in 1984.A new Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries Office has been completed. The D.H.S.S. is to be found in the same building.Radio antennae have been erected. There has been extensive renovation of the Rock Park and the Pump House. This is seen as a tourist attraction The tennis courts have been given all weather surface. The Lower School of the High Scool at Alexandra Road used for forms 1 and 2 has been closed and the school is on one site at Dyffryn Road.There are two private housing developments at the Lakeside and at Pentrosfa.
